title: I made a mistake in region while creating my account
body:
so I've decided to finally play league of legends today (just a few hours ago), when I was singing up, the page was in french (by default, since pretty much every website does that for someone who lives in Morocco like me) but I wanted to have the in-game language in english so I pressed the region button and changed it to north america and I signed up.

when I was playing the tutorial my character was slow at executing commands, I figured it's ping, it was giving like 400 ms during the game, so I contacted one of my friends who helped me know my actual ping which was just 60 ms,I searched a little bit to find that my account was assigned to the north american server, but when I tried to change the region (and installed the extra patch) I couldn't log in.

my account is not verified yet, I literally just made it, and only beat the tutorial, I was wondering if the moderators could change the region setting, or delete this account  (I want to keep the name, and I really can't wait for 15 days).

replies.body:
Oh geez, that's unfortunate. No worries though, I've got a couple options to get you on the best server for you to play on!

Since you just now created this account, if you haven't spent any money (meaning there's nothing to lose) you're more than welcome to go ahead and create a new account on the server you want to be on. It's also worth noting that each region has it's own list of available Summoner Names, so you can have a NEOXblackgold on NA and EUW/EUN for example. I'm willing to bet you'll be able to get that name on another region as well as NA!

If you're already pretty attached to this account, I'd suggest going ahead and reaching out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). There might still be a chance for us to move your account where you need to be to play the best.

thank you very much for the quick reply, it did work, I succesfully made a new account :)

I guess I'll have to delete this one now, I was only attached to the name, I'm a very forgetful person :/

thank you for the support :D
